title: ANOINTED Married Christian Men
description: ANOINTED Married Christian Men provides a fresh examination of the authority God gave husbands in marriage relationships, sex, abuse, and keeping children safe from the dangers family and friends can pose to children utilizing poetry, metaphors, and scripture.The relationship between David and Saul provides insights into marriage relationships. Sample prayers provide starting points for those new to prayer. Examples of child abuse provide eye opening areas in which parents can protect their children from abusers.ANOINTED Married Christian Men provides a realistic view of married Christian men for women, ways to empower husbands and wives, ways to enhance relationships and sex lives. It is fresh, real, and powerful.
author: Celia Wilson
